FlexiPage.description: Contact record page assigned to Advancement persona

componentInstanceProperties.name: visibilityByUser
componentInstanceProperties.value: (UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Partnerships' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Alumni_Corporate_Partnerships_Super_User' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Alumni_Engagement' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Event' OR UserRole.DeveloperName = 'Corporate_Engagement')
